text: Is the standard choice sweets then?

I thought about meal options too.
Like sandwiches, something easy to eat...

Whether sweet or savory,
something substantial might be better, don't you think?

It's a recording session with lots of movement!
I think energizing treats would be good!

By the way, does anyone know if someone
has a preference or dislikes certain foods?

The director,
mentioned that he can't eat cheese!
Oh, then we should avoid cheese...!

That seems like a food commonly used though...!
Kaho, good catch.

Art director-sama...
seems interested in the bakery near the station...

Not cheese-flavored,
like assorted savory and sweet bread...?
